channel.title: Sketch of the Day on Laura Kalbag
channel.description: Recent content in Sketch of the Day on Laura Kalbag

item.title: Sketch of the day
item.description:
A strange thing has happened in the last week. I’ve been a bit blue, but I’ve really got into my One Sketch A Day book. This was a lovely little book that Rachel Shillcock sent me.
I started on the 12th December last year, with a quick sketch. I tried really hard and 9 days filled out with quick-ish sketches. The most detailed was the Fringe-style seahorse I drew the day after we finished watching the Fringe finale.
